HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth  - NAV, Portfolio and Performance | HDFC Mutual FundsHDFC Small Cap FundEquityDIRECTREGULARAn open ended equity scheme predominantly investing in small cap stocks.
The Scheme shall follow a predominantly small cap strategy with a minimum exposure of 65% to small cap stocks. The Scheme may also seek participation in other equity and equity related securities to achieve optimal portfolio construction.
The aim of equity strategy will be to predominantly build a portfolio of small-cap companies which have:

reasonable growth prospects
sound financial strength
sustainable business models
acceptable valuation that offers potential for capital appreciation.

FAQsCan I invest in SIP and Lump Sum of HDFC Small Cap Fund ?Yes, SIP as well as Lump Sum investments are permitted with the minimum application amount being ₹100. Any additional purchase must have a minimum amount of ₹100 The SIP and Lumpsum are available in direct and regular plan with both Growth and IDCW option.
